key.name: enable-xsettings
key.description: Enables the XSETTINGS manager for toolkit settings sharing among the applications. Do not disable if you don't know what an XSETTINGS manager is.

key.name: enable-plugins
key.description: vera would be pretty useless if you disable this setting.

key.name: plugin-search-path
key.description: The plugin search path. Touch this only if you know what you're doing.

key.name: ignore-plugins
key.description: The plugin to ignore (they will not be started)

key.name: reverse-ignore-plugins
key.description: If enabled, the ignore-plugins array will be used to whitelist plugins. Every plugin not listed there will not be started. Do not enable unless you know what you're doing.
